mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_HOUSE (HOUSE_ID, USER_ID, CATEGORY_ID,HOUSE_ADDRESS,TOWNSHIP, NO_OF_GUESTS,NO_OF_ROOM,NO_OF_BATH, NO_OF_TOILET,AREA,NO_OF_FLOOR, NO_OF_AIRCON,WIFI,PHONE_ONE, PHONE_TWO,AVAILABLE_DATE,RENT, DEPOSIT,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE, EXPIRED_DATE,RECOMMENTED_POINTS,CONTRACT_RULE, PERIOD,RENT_FLAG,DELETE_FLAG, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATETIME) VALUES (#{house_ID}, #{user_ID}, #{category_ID}, #{house_ADDRESS}, #{township}, #{no_OF_GUESTS}, #{no_OF_ROOM}, #{no_OF_BATH}, #{no_OF_TOILET}, #{area}, #{no_OF_FLOOR}, #{no_OF_AIRCON}, #{wifi}, #{phone_ONE}, #{phone_TWO}, #{available_DATE}, #{rent}, #{deposit}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{expired_DATE}, #{recommented_POINTS}, #{contract_RULE}, #{period}, #{rent_FLAG}, #{delete_FLAG}, #{creator_id}, #{create_dateTime})
